name: NOC | Managed Object | Configuration Errors | Misconfigured SNMP

en.body_template: NOC is unable to interact with object using SNMP protocol. SA tasks will fall back to CLI, possible loosing some functionality. Check SNMP is opened for {{ip}}
en.symptoms: NOC cannot interact with the box over SNMP protocol
en.probable_causes: SNMP server is misconfigured, community mismatch or misconfigured ACL
